website_summaries.verdict: A hard-to-beat price makes this a great push broom if you're on a budget.
pros: Can sweep large and small debris, including rocks, leaves, and branches
The 60-inch handle works well for users of any height
cons: Plastic handle has a bit of a flimsy feel

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE! Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: You'd think the handle would just screw into the broom. Good luck! If and when I can get this weirdly configured hex bolt with screw attached below to actually turn in the solid hex shaped slot, I may like this broom. Until then, I'd advise anyone without a degree in logistical engineering to buy something more intuitive and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: kom

customer_reviews.title: little confusing... awesome after
customer_reviews.text: When getting this broom I tried to place the handle onto the broom in the standard fashion, but did not realize that it comes with a "Lock" for the handle to stay onto the broom piece itself. once figured out I was rockin' and rollin'! Cleaned my entire Garage and this bad feller totally helped make that job into a much less tedious task than it would have been had i tried to use a regular broom and dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: armando

customer_reviews.title: Hard for me to punch.
customer_reviews.text: This broom is very nice, but difficult to push! When I got it, I took it directly to my deck to sweep it off. I had such a hard time pushing, that I had to stop and sit for awhile. I'm a senior with medical problems, for sure, but I’ve never had a problem pushing a broom before. Is it because it's a large base? I don’t know, probably, but it doesn’t get me excited to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: handicapped shopperTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not great at brooming rough surface.
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake on order thing this broom, I was replacing one that I gave away not know what kind I had before I ordered this one. the problem with this broom is the middle bristles are really stiff and the outer ones are soft. so if you try to sweep a painted floor then the stiff bristles just glides over the floor and the soft bristles are not allowed to touch the floor so it does not sweep very well. then when you try to sweep something like the side walk or the floor mat with will just get stuck. Make sure this is the broom you need before you order.
customer_reviews.author: valfam

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are too soft to be effective outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are too soft to be effective outdoors. Fine for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Keith

customer_reviews.title: Pics needs to be updated without the scrapper.
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start off by the pictures. What you see isn’t what your getting. The pic showed a red push broom w/scrapper. I received a green push broom without a scrapper. It is a multi surface push broom that is 24 in. The only thing I can think of is that they are using a older pic. No clue!
customer_reviews.author: Uniquely Asian

customer_reviews.title: PUSH HARD when assembling....
customer_reviews.text: The broom itself is decent. However. Trying to assemble the thing was irritating. You have to take off that weird tab thing, then PUSH HARD while you screw the handle into the hole, otherwise it won’t screw in... I didn’t realize that and tried to just lock it in with the tab thing..... Once I read another review that told me to push really hard when screwing the handle it, I figured it out.... Not really sure that weird tab thing even has a purpose cause the handle can literally slide right of of it.....
customer_reviews.author: Thien N.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Handle does not fit broom head. Contacted Quickie customer service 3 times with pics, etc......no help whatsoever!!!
customer_reviews.author: EILEEN HAUGE

customer_reviews.title: Definitely and outdoor broom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was an indoor broom. Obviously my own mistake. We have a huge downstairs and it was so hard to sweep with a smaller broom. This was still pretty useful and convenient. However, the bristles are pretty rough because it was made to be used for outside. So it works indoors, hasn’t damaged the flooring or anything, but it could have been better if I bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Stupid handle installation!
customer_reviews.text: The handle is the absolute pits to install! WHY?????? There should have been instructions to make a handle that hard to install! Shame on the manufacturer!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: If you need a cheap push broom, that is what this is. The bristles catch on flat unpolished concrete so it is not comfortable to use. The first one I got was mis-machined so it could not be screwed together and I had to exchange it. Return was friendly and easy, but I was without my broom for another couple of weeks and couldn't get my yard work done. I would not buy again unless I could not afford a more expensive broom. If it was the only choice, though i would buy it. It is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: 40something

customer_reviews.title: Bulldozes Dirt!!
customer_reviews.text: Quickie makes great brooms! I've been using them for years now and they never disappoint. I use this particular broom in my garage to sweep up dust and dirt. The bristles don't wear down easy so you can have it around for a long time. You can use it for wet items or dry. Be sure to hang it up on a peg if you use it for wet items so it can dry off properly.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stegenga

customer_reviews.title: Brush Material is Good.but cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for cleaning my garage..its a big one...but after three usage..the plastic broken in a place..still its functionality stays..but cheap plastic is annoying one..its not really a light weight..the reason i have given 3 stars..it cleans well..brush material is good..
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to sweep out the Garage, and it does the trick. Didn't want to spend $45+ on a push broom, so I went with this. It has worked fine for me, and as long as I don't muscle it around too much, it should hold up for a while. It is very light weight, which gives the illusion/feeling that it might break sooner than I hope. We shall see. Seems to be worth the $30 price tag so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brody Weidner

customer_reviews.title: Stiff bristles and feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are a little stuff for being considered a general propose multi surface broom. But it gets the job done. I purchased for $13 which seemed like a good price. Until I found the exact same one at home Depot for $10. Was a bit disappointed, then the price almost double the next day. Which is ridiculous for a basic broom that has no special features.
customer_reviews.author: Jesuslovesyou101

customer_reviews.title: Good value broom
customer_reviews.text: I needed a broom to clean up the debris that gets blown into my garage. This one has a large surface area which sweeps a lot more debris then regular brooms. The downside for me is that is so hard to maneuver and push it. Other than the slight difficulty in pushing it, the broom seems sturdy with good thistles.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Sze

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, reliable, and effective
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for me to figure out how to attach the handle (need to remove plastic cover) but otherwise great product. Super wide broom and sturdy bristles allow for effective cleaning. We actually used it for a wedding as well to collect dollars that were tossed for the bride and groom and this worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cataziac

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it’s just me but....
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Do ALL push brooms stick when they are new? Sturdy and solid but when I try to use it, it gets stuck. I used my neighbors push broom all the time and it works just fine so either it’s new and needs some breaking in or, you’d better be looking for a work out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyl

customer_reviews.title: Not one of my better buys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my outdoor patio and though I like the size of it, it's not very durable. The handle is loose already and I've only used it a few times so far. It's heavier than it looks. Does the job, but I'd expect for the price of this, it would be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: DreamWeaver

customer_reviews.title: A Great Broom at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This broom is amazing. I bought it for sweeping/clearing debris from my concrete/brick patio and driveway outside, and this broom does not disappoint. I can dirt, mulch, sticks and stones. I've been using it for a couple months now. There isn't much else that needs to be said about it. It does exactly what it is supposed to do. If you're in the market for a strong, capable broom for pushing debris on rough surfaces, stop searching and buy this broom!
customer_reviews.author: Everett K

customer_reviews.title: What you would expect for $20
customer_reviews.text: What you would expect for $20 This room is flimsy and lightweight and it was difficult to put together. It gets the job done but the bristles don’t have a lot of impact on rough surfaces. I wouldn’t recommend for outdoor use such as sidewalks and paths which is why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ura Beatch

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little disappointed that, although this broom is very sturdy and well made, the material in the actual broom is so stiff it’s hard to sweep. Maybe they will soften up but it’s not what I wanted for my job. Maybe it’s made for another purpose. I just want to sweep my cement driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Carole McKenney

customer_reviews.title: this is a great broom
customer_reviews.text: we use it to push small rocks off the driveway and back onto the sides where they belong. stiff and sturdy bristles can push the small rocks without any issues. this broom also sweeps away sand very well. perfect for a shore house.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Assemble but once you Figure it Out it Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble with insufficient instructions but once you figure it out. It works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult to attach handle
customer_reviews.text: The broom sweeps okay...like any other broom. But it took me an hour to figure out how to attach the handle. No instructions provided either in the package or on the company's website. Is the company intentionally trying to go bankrupt? Maybe it's a "Springtime for HItler" thing. Time is money and I wasted mine on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Harley A. Feinstein

customer_reviews.title: This purchase was one of the two best decisions we made since moving
customer_reviews.text: We moved from mostly carpet to all solid surface floors and sweeping was a NIGHTMARE. This purchase was one of the two best decisions we made since moving. Works fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 5 stars, even though I had trouble getting the handled attached to the base. I ended up getting a brace designed for a different broom and attached it to this one. Not it will never come apart, which kind of defeats the storage option, but I would rather have a sturdy broom.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: 6 month update: Easy to assemble if you read
customer_reviews.text: 6 Months in still pushing along. Instructions are on handle. Winging it I didn’t do great putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We could. It figure out how to assemble this. It comes with no instructions. We read every review and think the one we got must have been missing something. There is one screw on the hexagonal casing, snd it would be impossible to out the casing back on if you could screw in the handle without it. We are throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: LDDC

customer_reviews.title: Get A Grip as this one doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: The product did not hold up in shipping. As a result, one of the black plastic clips (which quite frankly, are cheap) broke. Also, the grip at the end of the handle isn't affixed (as in glued) so it moves easily when sweeping. I will resolve the instability by gluing it. As for how well it works or how long it will last... hard to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Broom is solid, but the handle is loose at base of brush. Regardless how you try to tighten handle into brush base. May have to use wood glue or something like that to secure handle to base.
customer_reviews.author: CackleFruit

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received was damaged, but we were able to swap it out easily and the second one was assembled and put to use immediately. We used it to deep clean the floor in our home (light colored textured porcelain tile), where the tile and the grout can hold onto dirt that steaming and mopping the floors do not get. This works really well, we are going to get a second one for our door cleaning where I think this would be game changing.
customer_reviews.author: Naziret

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty hard to assemble. It seems like it'd just screw in but you have to do it extremely hard. I could not do it myself and I had to have my husband do it and it was difficult for him as well but be finally got it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Good Broom
customer_reviews.text: They don't make them like they used to! This broom does the job, but keep in mind that it is plastic and not wood. It is not as sturdy as the old wooden brooms, but it is light and easy to handle. Good for every day sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: Dani K

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal broom for the price
customer_reviews.text: Is definitely a very stiff brush but works well on concrete floors, the squeegee work's decent but doesn't replace a typical squeegee. FYI it does arrive in a very long box, price on Amazon was typical as compared to local store
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mikey O

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but heavy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a sturdy outside broom however, it’s weighty! Not the easiest to broom with especially if your a lightweight! Bristles spf the broom are also sturdy and great for using o it side but be careful not to use indoors on wood as it may scratch the floors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Outside Buy
customer_reviews.text: Affordable. Functional. Very Good for Outdoors. Like the Green BLUE is BETTER. Space Saver Storage. Strong. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Redlands Educator

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.text: Remove the cap/cover on the brush before trying to assembly the pole. Insert the pole, screw it in, replace the cover and snap it on. This isn't intuitive and the minimal images for instruction are not clear. Product works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cab17

customer_reviews.title: Kinda hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was going to toss it at first, could not the head screwed into the handle, yet gave it one last try and with a bit of persistence it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff bristles
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bristles are stiff and seem to be sturdy so far. I recieved it in a timely manner. So far I am pleased with this purchase and hope to get good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: sassyforever

customer_reviews.title: The mans broom
customer_reviews.text: Look if you need a good broom that doesn’t make you look feminine this is your broom. This is the man’s broom. This is the broom that you break out when your garage door is open on a nice sunny day and all your neighbors are out in the front lawns . You take that broom, that manly manly broom, and you sweep. you sweep away.
customer_reviews.author: acelesson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it on my driveway, sidewalks, garage and patio. Pushing grass, dirt, small rocks, glass. It’s well worth it. I don’t use the storage feature bet it’s a bit of work to take apart. I just lean it against a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst assembly ever encountered
customer_reviews.text: As an engineer, I can honestly say whoever designed the attachment feature is immensely incompetent. Something that should be so basic was next to impossible. I needed to clean up the threads with a file and hammer it in until they engaged. A mallet did not provide enough impact force. Maybe there is significant variability from one broom to the next. Other than assembly, the broom seems to broom...
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and hard to push
customer_reviews.text: I just found this broom to be cumbersome. It does not sweep smoothly at all, I found myself just picking up the old house broom. No a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be of good quality. Only time will tell on how it holds up (it lives outdoors in the midwest).
customer_reviews.author: Erin W

customer_reviews.title: Very long broom in length of broom stick
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this broom for use outside on patio. I assembled it today. I think it will work well for my family.
customer_reviews.author: True Primer 22

customer_reviews.title: I found this broom a little too stiff for the garage floor...
customer_reviews.text: ...where I think I prefer a softer set of bristles. It works well on the driveway and pavers, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Nepon-sixt

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk! The broom had no way to screw the handle into a cheap plastic bracket. Called the company and was sent a replacement which was the wrong broom and had the same lack of appropriate handle attachment (no threads on the broom into which one should be able to firmly attach the handle the tip of which was threaded).
customer_reviews.author: John T Oneal MD

customer_reviews.title: Very strong broom.Does exactly what i puirchased it for.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this broom. Does exactly what I purchased it for. My garage driveway and sidewalks. Cant find any other broom this size that works as well as this one does. The price was great for what you get !!!
customer_reviews.author: Pauly G

customer_reviews.title: the handle will not stay in the bruse
customer_reviews.text: It something missing . The handle will not screw into the brush head. I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: true crime reader

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The broom does its job and is lightweight. Strongly recommend that you watch the YouTube video for instructions on how to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L.

customer_reviews.title: El spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: It's mui fantastico! I love it - does the job, no fuss no muss no leaves! And takes me half the time now 'cause this chingavera is BIG! The right size for the job.
customer_reviews.author: C. Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing broom
customer_reviews.text: Every mom of little kids needs one of these lol. Makes cleaning so much easier. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ayden Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great large outdoor broom
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice good quality study large broom. It is my ouside broom and clears my patio very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: When it arrives, the handle is already bended/damaged.
customer_reviews.text: When it arrives, the handle is already bended/damaged. I decide to keep it because I don't want to travel to UPS at this time. The handle is just too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: TomtomGarmin

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: I use this broom to clear the water that puddles at the bottom of my stairs in the back entrance of my house and it does this as well as possible to do so. I do not know about durability since I have only had it a short time and limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I’ll be able to clean in wet area also but wasn’t very effective there but overall I like the quality for same and it has scraper also. it was interesting to assemble this as there weren’t any instructions
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: sturdy good price broom
customer_reviews.text: perfect broom.for outdoor cleaning. Works well on my concrete patio and nice price
customer_reviews.author: holle

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. It’s a broom. Have used often and works well enough. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: jclflorida

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy and works great! Was skeptical about quality, but its great!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pole does not fit into the brush slot!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tried everything. Something here is clearly defective. We needed to go ahead with our project, so we used a different pole, but as that pole wasn't made for this brush, we had to keep on reattaching. Nightmare. Do yourself (and your back) a favor and buy another broom!
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Like the broom, sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Makes short work on sweeping the garage. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor broom
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy broom. It took out mud from my concrete patio.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana S.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The handle did not fit the broom. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. It is very sturdy and both ends work very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great Push Broom
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice push broom it is very effective and easy to use. Good value for $20.00.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom by far
customer_reviews.text: This is my second broom over the last few of years, they are easy to use, real durable and work better than the man-made fiber brooms by a LONG shot. It is similar to a whisk/ corn broom your Granny or mom has always used. Whats great is that what your sweeping actually gets move like you intend. Dirt, sand, pebbles and snow all goes where you want with little to none left behind and almost none gets caught up inside the broom itself, I love these, hard to find in stores...
customer_reviews.author: satisfied

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing wrong with the broom itself. In ...
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the broom itself. In my opinion the interior bristles are too stiff for a smooth interior surface. When sweeping a more soiled area, the broom leaves tracks of unswept material. A softer bristled broom will not do this.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this broom for my parking lot! Quickly sweeps up leaves and cigarette butts! Will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Miers

customer_reviews.title: Strong sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Item works great. Cleans my front porch with ease and sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: A bit confusing to setup
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is great, but it took me a little longer to assemble it. I thought the instructions are not very clear
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it even gets in corners. Takes half the time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this broom for its strength and low cost!
customer_reviews.author: No FedEX Shipping

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: The handle comes off so I'm thinking of using Gorilla glue on it.....but a perfect sweet every time!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: Overall great broom, my only complaint is it was not easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Stormi Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!!
customer_reviews.text: I totally had to YouTube how to assemble it hahahaha! Great broom! Super sturdy and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The broom seems decent, the threads on broom handle do not tighten it screws all the way down but keeps spinning but the biggest problem is that it is advertised as a 2 pack(two brooms included) I only recieved one. I dont want to return it I just want my other broom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet but don't think there is not much chance of anything go wrong with these kind of products. It was delivered quickly which was huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: tkzvw30

customer_reviews.title: Good broom / Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good broom for wood decks. Will use to keep snow off the decks.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a WOOD handle as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This says it has a wooden handle which is the reason I bought it. I live in florida and just had one of these with the metal handle. I bought this one to replace it. Guess what. The Handle is NOT WOOD. It’s the same as I just had rust out on me. This broom is NOT as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JP M.

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!
customer_reviews.text: Great broom for the price. It’s sturdy, but not super heavy. Thick bristles. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Not a good sweep, sparse bristles
customer_reviews.text: The handle and head of the brush are sturdy but the bristles are flimsy and not are dense. I purchased 2 and am very disappointed. The brush does not sweep well when pushed- its a push broom so should give a better sweep. I would not recommend this broom.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for garage sweeping
customer_reviews.text: Good for smooth surfaces. Not for heavy duty outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Stiff bristles
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff bristles, not good for my smooth garage floor. Doesn’t push anything but big pieces. Leaves trail of dust and smaller items behind.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A must buy worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best garage brooms I have purchased in years I recommend. I have bought many push rooms over the years and they just were not up to par but this one is an 8 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: “Undeliverable” product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered with one day shipping from Amazon Prime only for them to tell me the item is “Undeliverable” 3 days later, and won’t be refunded for another 5 days. I understand this item is large/awkward but I have had no problems having anything, ANYTHING, else delivered through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: It wont go together. Item was retooled and stick will not fit brush. Help
customer_reviews.author: Paul Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: After only a few weeks of use the bristles permanently bent making it very difficult to use. Not very durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: James Sabata

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: If your hoping to use this for heavy duty work like cleaning your garage floor or driveway this broom is not what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent broom
customer_reviews.text: It works and sweeps. Does the job well. Sturdy and good bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Paich Family

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great around my pool deck area. Would get the softer bristles if you plan to use in a garage. If you plan to use on both, this will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This broom is not durable - broke in 35 days
customer_reviews.text: The spine of this broom snapped 35 days after I bought it (just outside the 30 day return window). Used it about 4 times before it snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy broom
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need it to. I personally use it outside for my deck/patio. It's excellent. I have not used it inside, as it went outside first, so that would be gross. All in all it's a sturdy broom as is good at pushing the dirt/debris/leaves off.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Does exactly what a broom should do.
customer_reviews.author: Nikosdad

customer_reviews.title: Needed modification upon arrival...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. There was some sort of metal point sticking out on the inside of the thread where you screw the handle in. I had to bend it with a screwdriver to be able to screw the handle in
customer_reviews.author: Brett Booth

customer_reviews.title: This broom is not worth 5 dollars
customer_reviews.text: This item broke within 2 weeks of me using it. It honestly was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Doice John

customer_reviews.title: This broom doesn't mop
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow can this thing sweep. It's one big bad broom. Every garage should have one of these bad boys. I find myself skipping and singing Chim Chum Cheree with this. Came in a box. Satisfies all my sweeping needs.
customer_reviews.author: APlan

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong handle for the broom head
customer_reviews.text: Save your money....can not even match the right broom handle with the broom head. Sent the wrong handle, very large box -- impractical to return and totally a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Cawly

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, but the handle wouldn't stay tight
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, but the handle wouldn't stay tight. Wrapped the threads with some plumbers' tape and that solved the problem. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Broom impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This broom was impossible to assemble. It came with a plastic cap over the threads, and apparently it had MELTED together -- so did not come apart. I had to take it to a hardware store to ask them how to assemble it -- and they had to use VICE GRIPS to get the cover off! I am not sure if these were stored in excessive heat or defectively manufactured, but I would never buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Wander

product_meta.title: Quickie Bulldozer Push Broom, Green
product_meta.description: Color:Green| Style Name:Multi-Surface (24 inch)The Quickie Bulldozer 24-Inch Multi-Surface Push Broom is made for indoor and outdoor use and is made for use on medium textured surfaces. The broom features a combination of stiff inner fibers that handle concrete, asphalt and wood and soft outer fibers that sweep fine dirt and dust from all surfaces. The fibers are set in a quality, 24-inch resin block that won't warp, rot or crack. A 60-inch steel handle and hang-up feature for off-the-floor storage complete the broom set. Quickie designs, manufactures and distributes over 300 cleaning products for traditional in-home use as well as contractor and DIY grade applications. The product line includes mops, brooms, dusters, dustpans, brushes, buckets and other supplies.
feature_bullets: Sweeps sand, mulch, grass clippings and drywall debris
60-inch powder coated steel tight grip handle with swivel hang-up feature
